job_title.description: A descriptive job title according to main roles of the job position. This can be different from the job title from the original posting.

key_roles.description: 1-3 key responsibilities of the role with **bold keywords**

work_term_length.description: Duration of employment in months (Usually multiples of 4)

work_term_month.description: Start and end months of the work term

working_location.description: Working location formatted as 'City, Province' for Canada, 'City, Province, Country' for international, 'null' for fully remote position
